critique: The document is an executive order regarding the transfer of space-related projects and funding from the Department of Defense to NASA. The primary emotions the President likely wants to elicit are joy (at the advancement of space exploration), surprise (at the scale of the transfer), and perhaps a reduction in fear (related to national security through space). There's little to suggest sadness, disgust, or anger being intentionally conveyed. The language is formal and bureaucratic, focusing on the legal and financial aspects of the transfer.
